name: Sincerely (PostalService)
description:
Sincerely is a cozy 3d platforming game about finding lost letters and exploring a charming island village.

This game was originally made by members of a VCU introductory game design class and then expanded on over the summer. Members include Eden Neifeld, Quang Vo, Raquel Hetherington, Zekeya Hurley, Cygnus Mare, and Natt Pimsuwan. Additional asset creation by Cate Duckwall, Ani Bhandari, Sydney Hetherington, and Tammy Nguyen. Music by Benjamin Neifeld.

Credit to used assets including

Sound Dogs’ The Art of Foley, Disk 8, 2001

Immersion 5.1 by Point One Sounds Inc, CD 06, 2003
